title: JJ Chalmers: Meeting the pilot who flew me home injured from Afghanistan - BBC News
description: JJ Chalmers was flown to Tokyo by the same man who flew him home from Afghanistan 10 years ago.

title: Nirvana sued by the baby from Nevermind's album cover - BBC News
description: Spencer Elden, who was photographed as a four month-old, is alleging child pornography.
